    • Method Detail

      • data_from_csv_file_is_loaded_to_table

        @Given(value="^data from (.*?) csv file is loaded to table (.*?)$")
public void data_from_csv_file_is_loaded_to_table(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String tableName)
        Loads data from csv file to data base
        It uses csv file as an input and TestData.{filename}.TypeMapping object
        TypeMapping shall contain mapping columns to type for particular csv
        Type mapping shall be in the form of a List. For example
        inputTypeMapping : ["NUMERIC","VARCHAR","VARCHAR"], where input file name is input.csv
        Input file shall be located in subdirectory input
        Parameters:
        fileName, - String, name of the input csv file that contains input data (without .csv extension)
        tableName, - String, name of the table to which data shall be loaded

      • select_query_is_executed

        @When(value="^select query (.*?) is executed and results stored as (.*?)$")
public void select_query_is_executed(java.lang.String sQuery,
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String queryResultName)
        Executes sql select query
        Results are printed to the log and attached as a file attachment to the report
        They are available as a ctx.Object for further processing and validation

        Uses following objects:
        ctx.Object.queryResultName
        Parameters:
        sQuery, - String, query to be executed (can also be defined in test data config, in that case this parameter act as query identifier)
        queryResultName, - String, name of the context object that is going to be used to store path to the select query results

      • validate_that_select_query_result_is_like_template

        @Then(value="^validate that select query result (.*?) is like (.*) template$")
public void validate_that_select_query_result_is_like_template(java.lang.String queryResultName,
                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String templateName)
        Verifies sql select query results by executing template comparison

        Uses following objects:
        ctx.Object.queryResultName
        Parameters:
        queryResultName, - String, name of the context Object that stores the query results
        templateName, - String, name of the template used for comparison

      • create_table_backup_with_name

        @When(value="^create table (.*?) backup with name (.*)$")
public void create_table_backup_with_name(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                                                     java.lang.String backupName)
        Creates table backup in the dB
        Parameters:
        tableName, - String, name of the table
        backupName, - String, name of the backup table

      • verify_that_content_of_table_equals_content_of_table

        @Then(value="^verify that content of table (.*?) equals content of table (.*)$")
public void verify_that_content_of_table_equals_content_of_table(java.lang.String tableAName,
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String tableBName)
        Verifies that content of 2 tables A and B is the same
        Parameters:
        tableAName, - String, name of the table A
        tableBName, - String, name of the table B
